source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  The [amp-addthis](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-addthis-v0.1.md) component integrates AddThis Floating Bar and Inline Share Buttons.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  </head><body>http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-addthis/index.html
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <title>amp-addthis</title>
  <script async custom-element="amp-youtube" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-youtube-0.1.js"></script>
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!--
  Import the `amp-addthis` component.
  -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-addthis" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-addthis-0.1.js"></script>

  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
  <style amp-custom>
    amp-addthis[data-widget-type=floating] {
      left: 0;
    }
  </style>
  <!--
  ## Floating share buttons

  Placed on the side of your page, following your reader as they scroll. A great way to promote sharing without getting too in-your-face.
  -->
  <amp-addthis width="320" height="92" layout="responsive" data-pub-id="ra-5c191331410932ff" data-widget-id="957l" data-widget-type="floating">
  </amp-addthis>

  <!--
  ## Inline share buttons

  Integrate share buttons into your content for a seamless sharing experience.
  -->
  <amp-addthis width="320" height="92" data-pub-id="ra-5c191331410932ff" data-widget-id="mv93" data-widget-type="inline">
  </amp-addthis>

  <!-- ## Implementation -->
  <!--
  Visit the [addthis homepage](https://www.addthis.com/academy/how-to-install-addthis-inline-share-buttons-on-amp-accelerated-mobile-pages) to learn to how to setup AddThis on AMP or check out this video for step-by-step instructions:
  <amp-youtube width="560" height="315" layout="responsive" data-videoid="BSkuAB4er2o">
  </amp-youtube>
  -->
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

The [amp-addthis](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-addthis-v0.1.md) component integrates AddThis Floating Bar and Inline Share Buttons.

Introduction

The amp-addthis component integrates AddThis Floating Bar and Inline Share Buttons.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

The [amp-addthis](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-addthis-v0.1.md) component integrates AddThis Floating Bar and Inline Share Buttons.

sections.code:
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  </head>
<body>http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-addthis/index.html
  <meta name="viewport"
    content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async
    src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <title>amp-addthis</title>
  <script async
    custom-element="amp-youtube"
    src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-youtube-0.1.js"></script>

<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
<style amp-custom>
  amp-addthis[data-widget-type=floating] {
    left: 0;
  }
</style>

  <style amp-custom>

  </style>

sections.doc_:
## Floating share buttons

Placed on the side of your page, following your reader as they scroll. A great way to promote sharing without getting too in-your-face.
sections.code:
<amp-addthis width="320"
  height="92"
  layout="responsive"
  data-pub-id="ra-5c191331410932ff"
  data-widget-id="957l"
  data-widget-type="floating">
</amp-addthis>
